attributes.action: give Tony Hart a posthumous knighthood for his services to children art and design for over 50 years
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Tony Hart was an inspiration to millions of children over his 50 year career. There are generations that owe an enduring knowledge and gain pleasure from the arts and design because of him. To the Arts and Design he is the unsung hero who has inspired 50 years of creative talent that has help made the UK a centre of exceptional creativity. He did this without too much fuss like all good people. It is about time we thanked him properly

rejection.details: The Cabinet Office is actively seeking nominations for honours from the public. Please go to http://www.honours.gov.uk/
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
